korean: 새벽에 인스타 광고를 보다가 또 충동구매를 해버렸다.
필요 없는 건 알지만 할인율이 너무 높아서 클릭하고 말았어.
내일 아침에 후회하겠지만 일단 결제는 완료됐다.
english: I ended up impulse buying again while scrolling through Instagram ads at dawn.
I know I don't need it, but the discount was too good to pass up.
I'll probably regret it tomorrow morning, but the payment is already done.
I'm worried about next month's credit card bill.
